labels.name: P2: Fix can wait a while

data.client_settings: [BUILD INFO] Release Channel: canary, Build Number: 15268, Version Hash: 95844e2173933ff43d556f38545fd7824d95ab55
data.actual_result: The window moves slightly and have to exit settings to see Changelog and Discord bugs out for a couple seconds
data.expected_result: Changelog should open when you click on it.
data.short_description: Changelog isn't showing up when you click on it in settings.
data.steps_to_repro: - Go into settings to check Changelog - Once clicked on Changelog it seemed as if the windows expanded for a second, but nothing else happens. - Exit out of settings and Changelog shows, top of background goes out of sync, and Discord becomes slow for a couple seconds.
